nodes.name: _getSettingVariables

calculateEarning(bytes32).details: Calculate the content creator/host/The AO earning when request node buys the content.	Also at this stage, all of the earnings are stored in escrow

params._purchaseReceiptId: The ID of the purchase receipt object

params._settingTAOId: The TAO ID that controls the setting

getTotalStakedContentEarning(bytes32).details: Return the earning information of a StakedContent ID

params._stakedContentId: The ID of the staked content

getTotalStakedContentEarning(bytes32).return: the total earning from staking this contentthe total earning from hosting this contentthe total The AO earning of this content

releaseEarning(bytes32).details: Release the payment earning and inflation bonus that is in escrow for specific PurchaseReceipt ID

params._purchaseReceiptId: The purchase receipt ID to check

setAOSettingAddress(address).details: The AO sets AO Setting address

setNameTAOPositionAddress(address).details: The AO set the NameTAOPosition Address

setSettingTAOId(address).details: The AO sets setting TAO ID

params._settingTAOId: The new setting TAO ID to set

setWhitelist(address,bool).details: Whitelist `_account` address to transact on behalf of others

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfer ownership of The AO to new address

params._theAO: The new address to be transferred
